title: Here’s What We’re Buying From The Final Week Of Ulta’s 21 Days Of Beauty
description: Ulta's 21 Days of Beauty sale — one of the year’s most highly anticipated shopping events — is now in its final week. From now till March 27, there will be 50% off flash sales featuring different products every day, ranging from makeup and skincare to hair and beauty tools.But here's the exciting twist: Alongside these daily 24-hour markdowns, the retailer is also introducing Weekly Beauty Steals, giving you an entire week to snag discounts off additional cult favorites. In other words, this is the perfect opportunity to score an excellent discount on everything you've been eyeing for your beauty cabinet, from investment purchases to holy grail restocks.With a little over a week left of the sale, our team of editors have combed through the entire list to highlight the deals truly worth your attention — and your money. Expect rare discounts on premium hairstyling tools, major savings on signature scents, and exclusive offers from brands like Tarte, Charlotte Tilbury, and IGK.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Sacheu Peel Off Liner STAY-N BundleDates: Week of March 14-20Sacheu’s long-lasting, peel-off lip liners took off on TikTok when Billie Eilish used them in a GRWM video. You can now grab the brand’s bestselling mocha and brown shades for 50% off. Best of all, this deal will be available for the entire week. Sacheu Peel Off Liner STAY-N Bundle, $, available at UltaBenefit Cosmetics Benetint Liquid Lip & Cheek StainDates: Week of March 14-20Benetint is having a major comeback thanks to its long-lasting formula and a natural flush of color that makes the lips (and cheeks) look plump. Floratint, a soft rose pink, is the perfect lip tint to usher in the spring.Benefit Benetint Liquid Lip & Cheek Stain, $, available at UltaPMD Personal Microderm Elite ProDate: Wednesday, March 19This at-home device claims to deliver professional-grade microdermabrasion results by buffing away dead skin cells to reveal a glowier complexion. The vacuum suction boosts circulation and collagen production, leaving the skin firmer and allowing skincare products to penetrate deeper. A half-off sale on this investment beauty tool is not one to be missed.PMD Personal Microderm Elite Pro, $, available at UltaPeter Thomas Roth Instant FIRMx Eye Temporary Eye TightenerDate: Wednesday, March 19This TikTok-viral treatment is your secret weapon when you want to look like you’ve had a good night’s sleep. Featuring a peptides- and silicates-rich formula, it’s a quick fix that works wonders on eliminating puffy under-eye bags, offering a temporary lifting effect that lasts up to 12 hours.Peter Thomas Roth Instant FIRMx Eye Temporary Eye Tightener, $, available at UltaDHC Deep Cleansing Oil Facial CleanserDate: Thursday, March 20Hailing from Japan, this oil cleanser is somewhat of a beauty insider secret. It smells and feels so luxurious, with a quick-emulsifying formula that dislodges even the most stubborn dirt and makeup.DHC Deep Cleansing Oil Facial Cleanser, $, available at UltaTarte Sculpt Tape ContourDate: Week of March 21-27Incoming: glowy, defined cheekbones that take practically zero effort to achieve. Dispersed from a cushioned tip blender, this sculpting wand adds instant definition to the contours of the face, all while blurring blemishes.Tarte Sculpt Tape Contour, $, available at UltaMurad Retinal ReSculpt Overnight TreatmentDate: Friday, March 21If you've struggled with purging as a result of retinol serums in the past, this gentle yet effective treatment featuring encapsulated retinal — a souped-up form of retinoid that is more effective — is a must-try. Its rejuvenating and smoothing benefits are highly rated, and it is rarely on sale. Make the most of it.Murad Retinal ReSculpt Overnight Treatment, $, available at UltaArmani Beauty Acqua di Gioia Eau de ParfumDate: Saturday, March 22Essentially a sunny Mediterranean vacation in a bottle, this beautiful fragrance sparks joy with notes of lemon, jasmine, gardenia, and cedarwood. If you love fresh, aquatic scents, this deal should not be missed.Armani Beauty Acqua di Gioia Eau de Parfum, $, available at UltaIGK Antisocial Bond-Building Repair Dry Hair MaskDate: Saturday, March 22If your hair feels dry and looks damaged, this hair mask is a no-brainer. It’s packed with vegan silk proteins, adding shine and hydration in a few spritzes — no need to rinse.IGK Antisocial Bond-Building Repair Dry Hair Mask, $, available at UltaEstée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce CremeDate: Saturday, March 22When it comes to skincare investments, this night cream is worth every cent — especially at 50% off. Hibiscus morning bloom extract and “Botox-like” acetyl hexapeptide-8 help boost the skin’s firmness, while vitamin E and moringa extract protect the skin from things like air pollution. Reviewers rave about the luxurious texture, which transforms from rich to weightless as it melts into the skin.Estée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Creme, $, available at UltaSunday Riley Pink Drink Firming Resurfacing EssenceDate: Sunday, March 23This treatment contains two star ingredients we love in skincare: peptides, which stimulate collagen production, and ceramides which strengthen the skin’s natural barrier. Reviewers also rave about the lightweight and refreshing texture.Sunday Riley Pink Drink Firming Resurfacing Essence, $, available at UltaPATTERN The 3-in-1 Interchangeable Curling IronDate: Sunday, March 23If you have curly or wavy hair, this could be your new hairstyling MVP. Featuring three thin tourmaline ceramic barrel attachments, this heat styler set lets you create everything from tight ringlets to beachy waves. The eight temperature settings and heat-protectant glove make this even easier to use.Pattern The 3-in-1 Interchangeable Curling Iron, $, available at UltaShiseido Benefiance Eye CreamDate: Wednesday, March 26Enriched with skin-strengthening peptides, antioxidant ginseng extract, and moisturizing squalane, this velvety eye cream helps reduce dark under-eye circles and puffiness without clogging pores.Shiseido Benefiance Eye Cream, $, available at UltaLiving Proof Triple Bond Complex Leave-In Hair TreatmentDate: Wednesday, March 26This is a fantastic addition to your post-shower hair routine if you’ve been struggling with shedding. It contains several peptides and lipids that reinforce weak hair fibers while enhancing overall shine and softness.Living Proof Triple Bond Complex Leave-In Hair Treatment, $, available at UltaCharlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Setting SprayDate: Thursday, March 27This lightweight, waterproof mist locks in makeup for up to 16 hours, ensuring no fading or settling into fine lines. Japanese green tea extract hydrates the skin, and aromatic resin blurs pores as though you’re wearing a soft-focus filter. The travel-size version is great for on-the-go touch-ups, and the fact that it will be less than $13 makes this a must-have.Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray, $, available at UltaLike what you see?
